summary: The diff replaces the app routing with TanStack Router (RouterProvider/createRouter) and adds a NotFound UI, but it does not implement the requested React Router (BrowserRouter + single Routes) setup, nor the explicit "*" fallback route in App.tsx. It also modifies an internal register page despite the request to limit changes to routing stabilization and NotFound fallback.

missing_requirements.requirement: Refactor frontend/src/App.tsx to be a minimal, stable React Router entrypoint with exactly one BrowserRouter and exactly one Routes block; ensure "/" renders LandingPage.
missing_requirements.reason: App.tsx uses TanStack Router (RouterProvider/createRouter) and contains no BrowserRouter or Routes block.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a "*" NotFound fallback route in frontend/src/App.tsx that renders the specified 404 card UI and a "Kembali" button navigating to "/".
missing_requirements.reason: A NotFound component exists, but there is no React Router "*" route; instead a TanStack rootRoute.notFoundComponent is used, which does not satisfy the requested implementation details ("*" route in App.tsx).

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove/avoid duplicate router providers/route trees/Routes blocks or dev-only code in frontend/src/App.tsx to prevent hangs/blank screens.
missing_requirements.reason: The change does not follow the requested React Router simplification; it introduces a different router system (TanStack Router) rather than the specified single BrowserRouter + single Routes block approach.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify/fix all imports in frontend/src/App.tsx for correct relative paths and casing for route components (LandingPage, client/partner/internal pages).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show any explicit casing/path-fix work for React Router usage; instead it changes router libraries and uses TanStack Router-specific imports (e.g., @tanstack/react-router, Link) rather than validating React Router route component imports as requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Replaced the requested React Router setup with TanStack Router (RouterProvider/createRouter/createRoute/createRootRoute/Outlet) and TanStack Link/useNavigate usage.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly requires BrowserRouter + single Routes block in App.tsx; TanStack Router is not requested and conflicts with the required implementation details.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified InternalRegister page behavior/UI state handling (submitted state flow and navigation via TanStack useNavigate), despite scope limiting changes to routing stabilization and NotFound fallback.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request says not to add new features beyond routing stabilization/NotFound and not to change UI/copy within existing auth simulation pages except as required to keep routing functional; the diff includes a direct modification to InternalRegister.

hallucinated_features.description: Implemented NotFound via TanStack Router's notFoundComponent on the root route rather than a React Router "*" route in App.tsx.
hallucinated_features.reason: The requested mechanism is an explicit "*" route inside a single Routes block in App.tsx; this is a different routing feature/approach than specified.
